Uses of Package
com.MASTAdView

Classes in com.MASTAdView used by com.MASTAdView
MASTAdDelegate
          The delegate class defines interfaces developers can use to extend and/or interact with feature and functions of the SDK ad handling, including: Ad download events and errors Rich media events (MRAID open, expand, etc.) Activities affected the ad view (clicks, resize, etc.) Third party ad events (client side hand-off for third party SDKs) Feature support decisions (SMS, phone, etc.) Log message events
MASTAdDelegate.AdActivityEventHandler
          Interface which supports custom callback to be invoked when ad view is attached to or detached from an activity (window), and when a banner ad view "expands" in any way (MRAID expand, resize, or interstitial display), and closes back again.
MASTAdDelegate.AdDownloadEventHandler
          The interface for ad download events.
MASTAdDelegate.FeatureSupportHandler
          Interface allowing application developers to control which device features are exposed to rich media ads.
MASTAdDelegate.LogEventHandler
          Interface for log event support allowing an application developer to augment or replace the logging behavior of the SDK.
MASTAdDelegate.RichmediaEventHandler
          Interface for rich media (MRIAD) event handler, invoked when MRAID events such as resize, expand, close, etc.
MASTAdDelegate.ThirdPartyEventHandler
          Interface for third party ad requests, with an onThirdPartyEvent() method invoked when client-side third party ad requests are received by the SDK.
MASTAdLog
          The SDK is instrumented with log() calls to record errors, warnings and server traffic for diagnostic purposes.
MASTAdRequest
          Class encapsulating all of the data and parameters associated with an ad server request.
MASTAdView
          Ad view object, acting as a container for an ad view control.
